channel.title: KnightFrames
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "KnightFrames" - Invisible?

item.title: Re: KnightFrames
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, I was saying I got the items on my first try every time, so that doesn't really apply.

I'm sure that's a "*shrug* So what?" for most people, but I'm the kind of person who fails to make rolls that are mathematically impossible to lose, so any sort of fortune in my favor is a shock to me.

item.title: Re: KnightFrames
item.content:encoded: The drop rate is low compared to other item drops, but remember that line in the wiki was put in before the +2% Event/Item/Find chance per failed find.

item.title: Re: KnightFrames
item.content:encoded: The wiki can be wrong, so yeah. The drop rate isn't that low.

item.title: Re: KnightFrames
item.content:encoded:
I was referring to the statement on the wiki that says, in regards to the KnightFrame A-E parts, "The drop rate for these is very low, so use your new bloodline to make this a much easier task."

They do show up in my permanent items, you're right. Interesting. Thanks. Didn't think they'd be there since they have no effect until you have all five.

item.title: Re: KnightFrames
item.content:encoded: I'm still pretty new at this game, but I think the KnightMARE Frame is hard to get. The KnightFrames show up under Permanent items in the main menu, the arena screen, the mission screen, and maybe other screens. Once you have all five, you need to do the quest for the Knightmare Frame which is hard because of the range I guess.

item.title: KnightFrames
item.content:encoded: So I keep getting KnightFrames on BurgerNinja missions. They're really easy to pick up; even with my atrocious luck I seem to get them every time. According to the wiki they're supposed to be difficult, so that's my first sign of a glitch. More importantly, however, they don't show up anywhere in my inventory: not my bucket, not the shop, not consumables. Is this normal?
